# VoilaFerry - Ferry Booking Platform

> A comprehensive ferry reservation platform for Mediterranean routes between Tunisia, Italy, and France.

## Overview

VoilaFerry is a full-stack ferry booking application that allows users to search, compare, and book ferry tickets across multiple operators (CTN, GNV, Corsica Lines, Danel).

## Tech Stack

- Frontend: React 18, TypeScript, TailwindCSS, Redux Toolkit
- Backend: FastAPI (Python), PostgreSQL, Redis, Celery
- Mobile: React Native (Expo)
- Infrastructure: Kubernetes (k3s), Docker, GitHub Actions CI/CD

## Main Features

- Multi-operator ferry search and comparison
- Real-time availability via WebSocket
- Secure payment processing (Stripe)
- User authentication (email + Google OAuth)
- Multi-language support (English, French, Arabic)
- Email notifications for bookings
- Admin dashboard for operators

## API Endpoints

Base URL: https://api.voilaferry.com/api/v1

- GET /ferries/ports - List all ports
- GET /ferries/routes - List all routes
- POST /ferries/search - Search ferries
- POST /bookings - Create booking
- GET /bookings/{id} - Get booking details
- POST /auth/login - User login
- POST /auth/register - User registration

## Routes Covered

Tunisia: Tunis, Sfax, Zarzis
Italy: Genoa, Civitavecchia, Palermo, Trapani, Salerno
France: Marseille, Nice
